file_content.text: I'm looking for humidity sensors. Sandstorm did a number on my vaporators.
Sensors in stock. Discount on bulk orders!
Great. I'll take, oh, ten sensors, and... hold on. I recognize those scraps. You stole them off my farm!
We no steal! We salvage! Now you buy, with discount!
Fine, but don't let me catch your friends near my vaporators again.
